title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 457.13 - Notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 457.13 - Notice

State Regulations
A person who is the subject of a referral or an
application for PSA must receive written notice of the district's determination
of eligibility or ineligibility for PSA in accordance with section
404.1
(f) of this

Title in the following circumstances: (a) when the district makes a determination
of eligibility or ineligibility for PSA after an application for PSA has been
made by an adult, the adult's authorized representative, or by someone acting
responsibly for such adult, in accordance with section
404.1
(c) of this

Title; or
(b) when the district
makes a determination of eligibility or ineligibility for PSA following
acceptance of a referral as defined in this Part and completion of a PSA
investigation and assessment in accordance with the terms of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
457.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
